title: Frontmatter Schema
description: Schema for validating frontmatter data in the awesome-copilot repository

workflows.description: Array of agent workflow file configurations

name.description: The name of the custom agent. If not specified, the file name is used.

description.description: A brief description of the custom agent, shown as placeholder text in the chat input field.

argument-hint.description: Hint text shown in the chat input field to guide users on how to interact with the prompt.

name.description: A unique identifier for the hook. Must be lowercase, using hyphens for spaces (for example, webapp-testing). Must match the parent directory name. Maximum 64 characters.

description.description: A description of what the hook does and when to use it. Be specific about both capabilities and use cases to help Copilot decide when to load the hook. Maximum 1024 characters.

name.description: Display name shown in the UI. Defaults to the file name.

description.description: Short description shown on hover in the Chat view.

name.description: The name of the prompt, used after typing / in chat. If not specified, the file name is used.

description.description: A short description of the prompt.

argument-hint.description: Hint text shown in the chat input field to guide users on how to interact with the prompt.

name.description: A unique identifier for the skill. Must be lowercase, using hyphens for spaces (for example, webapp-testing). Must match the parent directory name. Maximum 64 characters.

description.description: A description of what the skill does and when to use it. Be specific about both capabilities and use cases to help Copilot decide when to load the skill. Maximum 1024 characters.

argument-hint.description: Hint text shown in the chat input field when the skill is invoked as a slash command. Helps users understand what additional information to provide (for example, [test file] [options]).

workflow.description: Configuration for an agent workflow file

name.description: The name of the agent workflow.

description.description: A brief description of the agent workflow, shown as placeholder text in the chat input field.
